value.description: An M size tank that can store up to 360 nutrient paste meals in it. Makes a big mess when destroyed.

value.description: Slightly increases work speed (+5%) when placed near a workbench.\nOne workbench can only be connected to one tool cabinet but can still be connected to other types of cabinets.

mods.li: Medieval Times Unofficial Update No Nan and legendary

value.description: Smilodon fangs attached to a wooden handle. Bash with one side, stab with the other.

The infamous sugliin was created by primitive tribes more to strike terror into the hearts of their enemies rather than to be an effective weapon. This massive polearm consists of several sets of sharpened Lothurr antlers affixed to a long wooden shaft. You attack with the sugliin as if it were a massive axe or scythe, slashing and chopping at the targets with great arcs. This weapon is slow unwieldy and heavy.

mods.li: Medieval Times Unofficial Update No Nan and legendary
